td.content: s:patient describes Liver. patient is a 22 YO white female. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 62 in, Weight 102 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:a 22 YO white f presents with Liver for 12 days. she has a history of Hepatitis A for past 4 years. she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 63 in, Weight 104 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Liver transplantation - liver.

s:patient presents with Liver x 3 days. patient is a 22 year old female lobbyist. she denies ever using cigarettes denies any alcohol use o:Height 63 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, Hepatitis A Ab IgG positive, Liver Function Panel ALT=120 U/L,AST=100 U/L a:Hepatitis A p:administered Prednisolone - 30 mg daily with a taper, performed Hepatitis A Ab IgG, Liver Function Panel, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
